analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  cetasika duka kusala ttika
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad🔽From a mental good state …

original: Cetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Cetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: cetasikam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  cetasikam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Acetasikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naacetasiko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: acetasikam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na acetasikaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
